name: Exclusive Hover effects
author: Prince Chowdhury

sections.description:
Exclusive HOver effects have few hover effects on images,buttons for make your website stunning and beautiful

You can easily add hover effects using an image & embed them in separate page post.

See live demo here: http://weborseo.com/exclusive-hover-effects/

Video Tutorial:

Features

  • Super easy Installation.
  • JQuery and CSS3 Effects
  • 15 Effects (free version).
  • Custom post enabled.
  • Category Support.
  • Custom ordering.
  • option panel.
  • Shortcode Powered.
  • shortcode generator
  • All Major browser supported.
  • resposive design

Premium version

Purchase Premium version : http://tricorewebapps.com/downloads/exclusive-hover-effects-pro/

  • JQuery and CSS3 Effects
  • 35+ Effects (free version).
  • More effects is comming then you will get it
  • 24 hours support with email, Solve any problem related to plugin
  • Option for control your image
  • Option to space between each effect
  • Custom post enabled.
  • Category Support.
  • Font size
  • Font color
  • Font color
  • Image height
  • Image width
  • Custom ordering.
  • Option panel.
  • Shortcode Powered.
  • shortcode generator
  • All Major browser supported.
  • Resposive design
sections.installation:
Installing this plugin as regular wordpress plugin.

After install, this plugin enable a custom post called “exeffects”. Add category & items on that custom post.
After adding items, you are ready to use this plugin in your post, page, widget or anywhere you like.

Go to page > Add New. On the editor, you will see a blue button by clicking button you see the shortcode like [ex_effects category="Category_Name" style="style1"]

Use category title, not category id or slag. Make sure spelling is ok. It is case sensitive.

1.0

  • First Release

2.0

second release with many updates

2.1.1

effect are updated

2.2.1

completely fixed
